title: Pipetron Reference

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, propose any effect/event in your private chat to the host. This effect must have the same effect on every player. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the host approves it, the effect applies as soon as the host has approved it.
- After the effect is put into place, the message below is announced in day chat with its blank filled based on your chosen effect.

fields.name: Message:
fields.value: *"How's it going ladies and gentlemen. Welcome back to more GIM. In this video \____."*

desc:
Post 5486
*How's it going ladies and gentlemen.*
